# ColumnSlice.Index

**Type Alias**

The type that represents a position in the column slice.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Index = Int
```

## Supporting Types

- **ColumnSlice.Element**: The type of the column slice’s elements, which is an optional type of the parent column’s type.

items.description: The type of the column slice’s elements, which is an optional type of the parent column’s type.
